short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Axie Finder is an application to find Axies, easy to use, just select the parts, set the maximum price, and click Find!.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This application is for finding Axies by selecting the parts and the maximum price you want to spend. The application will look at the last 10 listed Axies, and if it finds an Axie with the parts you selected earlier, it will send you a notification to Telegram.
